short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension for removing critic and fan review ratings from search results and various popular webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to hide critic/audience media ratings from your web page results. Go back to looking for movies, TV programs, books, and video games without seeing other opinions/reviews.

VERSION 1.1: Support for Google Play and remove stars from search results.
